questions.question: BarmBrack, a fruitcake, is an Irish Halloween tradition. This cake contains:

choices.answer: special powers that will make you see ghosts
objects baked into the bread used as a fortune-telling game

questions.question: A getai, traditionally held in Singapore and Malaysia, is a live stage performance originally meant to:

choices.answer: entertain the King and his family
entertain the spirits that are let loose
entertain the military army of Singapore and Malaysia

questions.title: Dia de los Muertos
questions.description: Dia de los Muertos, or Day of the Dead, is a Mexican holiday that celebrates life and death. People visit the graves of their loved ones and remember their stories, honoring them with food, love, and joy.

imageMetadata.resources: Photo by Cristian Newman on Unsplash

questions.question: In Czech Republic, chairs are placed by the fireplace. There is one for each family member and:

choices.answer: one for each deceased family member
one for each day of the month
one for each season of the year
one for each guest they had during Halloween

questions.question: To avoid accidentally hurting invisible souls and ghosts, some Germans

choices.answer: dress as ghosts to be able to see the spirits.
hide all their knives during Halloween.
don't leave their house on Halloween.
drink a lot of coffee to stay alert in case a ghost appears.
